1: <pb/><t>Nman Dyos,</t> <t>Q'aq'antz tk'u'ja qi'je', ex qo' tky'iwlaku'ya;</t> <t>qo' tka'yitza tuk'i'l tzalajb'il,</t>
2: <t>tu'ntzun telkynik' kykyaqilju' tnam</t> <t>teju' t-xtalb'ila exju' kolb'il tu'na.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Nman Dyos,</t> <t>tz'ajwalinjtzxwita kyu'nju' tnam;</t> <t>¡kykyaqilxwitju' tnam che jaw ajwalinteya!</t>
4: <pb/><t>Che ẍch'inxwitju' nimaqtnam tu'n kytzalajb'il,</t> <t>ina' kawinta kyib'aju' tnam toj tnik'alti'j;</t> <t>¡aya ẍaqlulkye nimaqtnam toj tkyaqil twitz tx'otx'!</t>
5: <pb/><t>Nman Dyos,</t> <t>tz'ajwanlinjtzxwita kyu'nju' tnam;</t> <t>¡kykyaqilxwitju' tnam che ajwalin teya!</t>
6: <pb/><t>Matxi' taq'te tx'otx' tawal;</t> <t>¡matxi' qotzaj tky'i'wla'n Qman Dyos!</t>
7: <t>¡Awt Qman Dyos ky'iwlanqe!</t> <t>¡Kykyaqilxwitju' xjal twitz tx'otx' che q'on ninb'ilte! chiju' b'itzal.</t>
